maks kiyalath thibenawa.me lipiya kiyawaddi ekwarama mage mathakayata nagune troski pilimbaandawa lenin kala prakashayaki.'dilisena siyalla raththaran nowe.troski ge wadan boho dilisena shabdha sahitha namuth artha wirahithaya.abyawakasha widyawa, tharaka widyawa gana hondin danna ma mithra ajith deshapalana wishaye di nulbolayakse pota patalawa.gani(ikuth janadhipathi waranaye di sirisenata sahaya nodima gana eda peratugaminta elawa elawa pahara dunneya) thamange manasathula hataganna sithuwili siyalla yatharthaye pilimbaimbauwakse dakina ajith ee sithuwili walin asa gatena hamadetama hithuwakkari lesa damagasayi.enisa ohu yojana karana aluthin sithime kriyawaliya patangatha yuththeda ohugenma bawa mage awanka hangimayi.upali ge gurugithaya mara sawuththuyi kiyana gaman,gurugithayen upali uthsaha karanne samaja desapalana wadak.eeth.disata anuwa eya manawawadi yayi kochok karayi.kindiyata kiwuwath ajithge liyamaneathi wadagathma wakya eyayi.

"putha ara kamare arinna epa harida."eya kiwwe as deka loku karala muhunata amuthu hagimak ekathu karaganna gaman.meyawa hodayi daha ata sanniya natawanna.mara akshanne thiyenne.horar muwi aktrs kenekda danneth na.hihi sani liyonge kawruhariwathda.man ehema hithuwe aantige anawashya lesa wishala wi thibu kukku desa balanagaman.ayiyo math,naki ganiyektawath inna denne nane.as dekenuth balahathkarakam karanna hadanawa.kalata wadak nane,moko mata naginawa kiyalaya.hihi.aantita bayawenna deyak na.mage odokkuwe idagaththath aantita mukuth wenne na kiyala nam mata budu shuwar.eeth aantige putha nam ithin.hamme mathak weddith kichi kawenawa.aantige putha patra handiya.awurudu 20 withara athi.hamme sudu mune lassana berenawa.pani haliyak dakka kubhiyek wage math uuwa dakka wele idan uu dihamayi balan hitiye.uuta mitar welada koheda aanti ehata wenakan idala mata ahak gahala lagata awith mage athath mirikuwa.hamme ithin ne,matath patta sok eka.'passe set wemu.'man himita kiwwama mu thola hapala ha kiwwe natha.dan man agili gana gana inne ee sudu pu* dakinakan.hamme mathak weddith sok wenawa.mage hithayi malliyi dennama.poddak iwasapan malli patiyoi.ubata rasa kamak denawa me ayiya lagadima.ethakan iwasanna
